title: Font ID: Skype Informal Text
content:
Hello:

Can you ID this really cool informal handwriting font used by Skype?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090419225317im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/291738005_13f5cea372_5448.jpg)

Thanks,

Mikey :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
Angel you are so awesome!!! I bet Luc De Devroye looks up to you!

Thank you to infinity. I have been trying to figure this one out for like ever. If I had to retire from Typophile today, today would be a great day to do it.

Mikey :-)
